5#include <iostream>
6
7#include <libdecklink/device.hpp>
8#include <libdecklink/capture_callback.hpp>
9
10#include "handle_errors.hpp"
11
12void show_help() {
13 std:: cout << "deckview <device-name> | --list\n"
14 << "\n"
15 << "Show the output of a BlackMagic DeckLink video capture card in real time.\n"
16 << " \n"
17 << "USAGE:\n"
18 << " --list List all of the detected DeckLink devices\n"
19 << "\n";
20}
21
22void on_new_frame(const DeckLink::VideoInputFrame& frame) {
23 static unsigned long count = 0;
24
25 std::string timecode_str = "N/A";
26 try {
27 timecode_str = frame.timecode(DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::Serial);
28 } catch (const DeckLink::decklink_driver_error&) {
29 // Do nothing .. we just couldn't get a timecode
30 }
31
32 ++count;
33 std::cout << "Frame #" << count << " - " << frame.width() << "x" << frame.height()
34 << " @ " << DeckLink::PixelFormat_::pretty_print(frame.pixel_format())
35 << " (size: " << frame.size() << " bytes)"
36 << " timecode: " << timecode_str
37 << std::fixed << std::setprecision(2)
38 << " stream time: " << frame.stream_time()
39 << " hardware time: " << frame.hardware_reference_timestamp()
40 << std::defaultfloat
41 << std::endl;
42
43}
44
45void on_format_changed(
46 DeckLink::InputFormatChangedEvent notification_event,
47 const DeckLink::DisplayMode& new_display_mode,
48 DeckLink::DetectedVideoInputFormatFlags /* detected_signal_flag */
49) {
50 auto notification_event_raw = static_cast<BMDNotifications>(notification_event);
51
52 // Check for video field changes
53 if (notification_event_raw & bmdVideoInputFieldDominanceChanged) {
54 BMDFieldDominance fieldDominance;
55
56 const auto field_dominance = new_display_mode.get_field_dominance();
57 std::cout << "Input field dominance changed to " << to_string(field_dominance) << " ("
58 << DeckLink::FieldDominance_::get_description(field_dominance) << ")\n";
59 }
60
61 // Check if the pixel format has changed
62 if (notification_event_raw & bmdVideoInputColorspaceChanged) {
63 std::cout << "Input color space changed to (SOMETHING I HAVEN?T IMPLEMENTED)\n";
64 // << DeckLink::DetectedVideoInputFormatFlags_::pretty_print(detected_signal_flag) << "\n";
65 }
66
67 // Check if the video mode has changed
68 if (notification_event_raw & bmdVideoInputDisplayModeChanged) {
69 std::cout << "Input display mode changed to: " << new_display_mode.get_name() << "\n";
70 }
71}
72
73void on_error(const DeckLink::VideoInputError err) {
74 std::cout << "Video input error: " << to_string(err) << "\n";
75}
76
77int main(int argc, char** argv) {
78 if (argc != 2) { show_help(); return -1; }
79
80 std::string device_name{ argv[1] };
81 if ((device_name == "--list") or (device_name == "-l")) {
82 const auto devices = DeckLink::Device::List();
83
84 std::cout << "Listing detected devices:\n";
85 for (const auto& device: devices) {
86 std::cout << " - " << device.get_display_name()
87 << " ( " << device.get_vendor_name()
88 << " " << device.get_model_name() << " )\n";
89 }
90 return 0;
91 }
92
93 auto has_device = DeckLink::Device::Get(device_name);
94 if (!has_device) {
95 std::cerr << "Error: Unable to locate device named: " << device_name << ".\n";
96 return -1;
97 }
98
99 try {
100 auto& device = *has_device;
101 std::cout << " Using " << device.get_display_name()
102 << " ( " << device.get_vendor_name()
103 << " " << device.get_model_name() << " ) - Press <ENTER> to exit\n";
104
105 DeckLink::CaptureCallback delegate(on_new_frame, on_format_changed, on_error);
106 delegate.set_timecode_format(DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::RP188Any);
107
108 device.input()
109 .set_callback(std::move(delegate))
110 .enable()
111 .start();
112
113 getchar();
114 printf("Exiting.\n");
115
116 device.input()
117 .stop()
118 .disable();
119
120 } catch (const DeckLink::decklink_driver_error &ex) {
121 print_driver_error_details(ex);
122
123 } catch (const DeckLink::runtime_error& ex) {
124 std::cout << "\n"
125 << "An error occurred! \n"
126 << boost::diagnostic_information(ex) << "\n";
127 }
128
129 std::cout << "Shutting down cleanly\n";
130 return 0;
131}
